name: Live-score
tagline: Displays live-score of a match as a notification on linux systems.
body: # live-score live-score contains simple shell and python script, to fetch live match scores and show it as a notification on desktop. The url of the sports website is given as input to the python script, whose webpage title is fetched. The shell script then uses notify-send utility of linux to display the notification. The script runs infinitely and displays the notification in every 20 seconds. # how to execute Go to the folder location "/path-to-live-score/src/" and run the script using ./score.sh # screenshot
